paper_abstract: We extend Martin-Lof's Logical Framework with special constructions and typing rules providing internalized parametricity. Compared to previous similar proposals, this version comes with a denotational semantics which is a refinement of the standard presheaf semantics of dependent type theory. Further, this presheaf semantics is a refinement of the one used to interpret nominal sets with restrictions. The present calculus is a candidate for the core of a proof assistant with internalized parametricity.
paper_title: A Presheaf Model of Parametric Type Theory
